name: Squid Jump Squidmas Edition
description: I remade Squid Jump, the arcade game featured in Splatoon 1, in Pico-8! This holiday version of the game is a Squidmas gift for Niko Geyer. There's only one level currently, but I might continue to work on it. I recreated several of the sprites faithfully in Pico-8, but made modifications to make them more festive. Press X to jump, use the left and right arrows to control your jump while in the air.
